name: Casted
description:
Casted is a short, single-level platformer created as part of a 24-hour project competition that was made with Unity.

Challenge: Try and find all 3 apples!

Credits -

Programming: https://twitter.com/HeatedBread

Art by: https://twitter.com/MrChrisLHall

SFX by: https://twitter.com/Tui2A03

Music by: https://twitter.com/ben_burne
